component.summary: A workbench to interact with relational databases.

description.p: Queries is a workbench to interact with relational databases, with initial support for the Postgres database management system (DBMS).

ul.li: Feel at home: Establishing a database connection immediately shows all the relevant database contextual information (schemata, tables, views and columns) that you need to write valid SQL.

Correctness: All SQL is parsed and verified at the client side before being sent to the database server, allowing immediate feedback and faster iteration cycles when writing and debugging complex queries.
Security: Queries supports encrypted connections via SSL and TLS, allowing you to interact safely with remote (cloud or on-premise) databases.

Performance: Queries examines written statement sequences and executes them asynchronously when possible. That means that a script total execution time is bounded by the slowest query, and not by the ammount of statements you send to the server at the same time.
